CANOpen Addon

This CANOpen Addon provides the ability to monitor and communicate with CANOpen slave devices a CANOpen network. Specifically, reading TPDOs and writing SDOs and RPDOs.

Note: Using this custom device requires one CANOpen port per instance. This port cannot be shared with anything else. Only NI CANOpen devices are supported. NI XNET boards will not work. Make sure the CANOpen NI-Industrial Communications for CANopen 1.0.2 is installed on the target.

What do you want to do?

Add Device Node

To add and configure a CANOpen device node (slave), right click on the add-on instance and select Add Device Node from the shortcut menu.

Disable Add-on

To disable this add-on, right click on the add-on instance and select Disable from the shortcut menu.

Delete multiple items

To delete multiple items, right-click the object in the configuration tree and select Delete Multiple Items from the shortcut menu.
